text: 'aghafal hwla' almshrkwn, falam ytbsru wyelmu 'ana allah aladhi khalaq alsmwat wal'ard wama fihina min almkhlwqat ealaa ghyr mithal sabq, qadir ealaa 'an yakhluq 'amthalahum baed fnayhm? waqad jaeal allah lhwla' almushrikin wqtana mhddana lmwthm wedhabhm, la shaka 'anah atyhm, wamae wuduh alhaqu wdlaylh aba alkafirun 'iilaa jhwdana ldyn allah ezz wjlla
